type:

                ∀ (q : Int),
                  GE.ge q N →

                        ((Finset.Icc p q).sum fun n =>
                          { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.abs.seq n))
                      ε)) →
    ∀ {f : Nat → Nat},
      Function.Bijective f →
        And { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) ((fun n => abs (a (f n))) n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.converges
            (Eq { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.abs.sum
              { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) ((fun n => abs (a (f n))) n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.sum) →
          ∀ (ε : Real),
            instDistribLatticeOfLinearOrder.toSemilatticeInf.lt 0 ε →

                        GE.ge q N₁ →
                          Real.instLE.le
                            (abs
                              ((Finset.Icc p q).sum fun n =>
                                { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.abs.seq n))
                            (instHDiv.hDiv ε 2)) →
                  Int.instLEInt.le 0 N₁ →
                    (∀ (ε : Real),
                        instDistribLatticeOfLinearOrder.toSemilatticeInf.lt 0 ε →
                          Exists fun a_2 =>
                            ∀ (b : Int),

                                instDistribLatticeOfLinearOrder.toSemilatticeInf.lt

                                      { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (Int.instLEInt.le 0 n) (a n.toNat) 0,
                                          vanish := ⋯ }.sum))
                                  ε) →

      else 0)

∀ {a : Nat → Real},
  { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.nonneg →

            Monotone { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.partial →
              Monotone { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) ((fun n => a (f n)) n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.partial →
                (Exists fun Q =>
                    ∀ (N : Int),
                      Real.instLE.le ({ m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.partial N)
                        Q) →
                  (∀ (M : Int),
                      Real.instLE.le
                        ({ m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) ((fun n => a (f n)) n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.partial
                          M)

                    (Exists fun Q =>
                        ∀ (M : Int),
                          Real.instLE.le
                            ({ m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) ((fun n => a (f n)) n.toNat) 0,
                                  vanish := ⋯ }.partial
                              M)
                            Q) →
                      ∀ (N : Int),
                        GE.ge N 0 →
                          ∀ (M : Nat),

type:
∀ {a : Nat → Real},
  (∀ (ε : Real),
      GT.gt ε 0 →
        Exists fun N =>
          And (GE.ge N { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.abs.m)
            (∀ (p : Int),
              GE.ge p N →
                ∀ (q : Int),
                  GE.ge q N →
                    Real.instLE.le
                      (abs
                        ((Finset.Icc p q).sum fun n =>
                          { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.abs.seq n))
                      ε)) →
    ∀ {f : Nat → Nat},
      Function.Bijective f →
        { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.converges →
          And { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) ((fun n => abs (a (f n))) n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.converges
              (Eq { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.abs.sum
                { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) ((fun n => abs (a (f n))) n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.sum) →
            ∀ (ε : Real),
              instDistribLatticeOfLinearOrder.toSemilatticeInf.lt 0 ε →
                ∀ (N₁ : Int),
                  (∀ (p : Int),
                      GE.ge p N₁ →
                        ∀ (q : Int),
                          GE.ge q N₁ →
                            Real.instLE.le
                              (abs
                                ((Finset.Icc p q).sum fun n =>
                                  { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.abs.seq n))
                              (instHDiv.hDiv ε 2)) →
                    Int.instLEInt.le 0 N₁ →
                      ∀ (N : Int),
                        GE.ge N N₁ →
                          Real.instLT.lt
                              (abs
                                (instHSub.hSub
                                  ({ m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.partial N)
                                  { m := 0, seq := fun n => ite (GE.ge n 0) (a n.toNat) 0, vanish := ⋯ }.sum))
                              (instHDiv.hDiv ε 2) →
                            GE.ge N 0 →
                              ∀ (M : Nat),
                                (∀ (n : Nat), instLENat.le n N.toNat → instLENat.le (Function.invFun f n) M) →
                                  ∀ (M' : Int),
                                    instLatticeInt.toSemilatticeInf.le M.cast M' →
                                      GE.ge M' 0 →
                                        Superset (Finset.image f (Finset.Iic M'.toNat)) (Finset.Iic N.toNat) →
                                          Eq ((Finset.Iic M'.toNat).sum fun m => a (f m))
                                              (instHAdd.hAdd ((Finset.Iic N.toNat).sum fun n => a n)
                                                ((Finset.instSDiff.sdiff (Finset.image f (Finset.Iic M'.toNat))
                                                      (Finset.Iic N.toNat)).sum
                                                  fun n => a n)) →
                                            ∀ (q' : Nat),
                                              Set.instMembership.mem
                                                  (upperBounds
                                                    (Finset.instSDiff.sdiff (Finset.image f (Finset.Iic M'.toNat))
                                                        (Finset.Iic N.toNat)).toSet)
                                                  q' →
                                                Finset.instHasSubset.Subset
                                                    (Finset.instSDiff.sdiff (Finset.image f (Finset.Iic M'.toNat))
                                                      (Finset.Iic N.toNat))
                                                    (Finset.Icc (instHAdd.hAdd N.toNat 1)
                                                      (Nat.instMax.max q' N.toNat)) →
                                                  ∀ (x : Int),
                                                    (Exists fun a =>
                                                        And
                                                          (And (Nat.instPreorder.le (instHAdd.hAdd N.toNat 1) a)
                                                            (Nat.instPreorder.le a (Nat.instMax.max q' N.toNat)))
                                                          (Eq a.cast x)) →
                                                      And (instLatticeInt.toSemilatticeInf.le (instHAdd.hAdd N 1) x)
                                                        (instLatticeInt.toSemilatticeInf.le x
                                                          (Nat.instMax.max q' N.toNat).cast)
name: Chapter7
Series
